mapper.insert: insert into property (property_no, custid, rent_type, address, address_detail, building_name, floor, property_type, deposit, month_fee, maintence_fee, built_year, roomsize, property_title, property_text) values (seq_property_no.nextval, #{custid}, #{rent_type}, #{address}, #{address_detail}, #{bulildingName}, #{floor}, #{property_type}, #{deposit}, #{month_fee}, #{maintence_fee}, #{built_year}, #{roomsize}, #{property_title}, #{property_text})
mapper.select: select p.property_no from (select * from property order by property_inputdate desc) p where rownum = 1
mapper.insert: insert into roomoption (property_no, pet, car, elevator, air_conditioner, fridge, washing_machine, gas_stove, electric_stove, microwave, desk, rack, bed, closet, shoecabinet, doorlock, wifi, total) values (#{property_no}, #{pet}, #{car}, #{elevator}, #{air_conditioner}, #{fridge}, #{washing_machine}, #{gas_stove}, #{electric_stove}, #{microwave}, #{desk}, #{rack}, #{bed}, #{closet}, #{shoecabinet}, #{doorlock}, #{wifi}, #{total})
insert into maintence (property_no, internet, tvfee, cleaning, waterfee, gasfee, electronic) values (#{property_no}, #{internet}, #{tvfee}, #{cleaning}, #{waterfee}, #{gasfee}, #{electronic})
mapper.update: update property set issoldout = 'false' where property_no = #{property_no}
update property set issoldout = 'true' where property_no = #{property_no}

update property set rent_type = #{property_no}, address = #{address}, address_detail = #{address_detail}, building_name = #{building_name}, floor = #{floor}, property_type = #{property_type}, deposit = #{deposit}, month_fee = #{month_fee}, maintence_fee = #{maintence_fee}, built_year = #{built_year}, roomsize = #{roomsize}, property_title = #{property_title}, property_text = #{property_text} where property_no = #{property_no}

update option set pet = #{pet}, car = #{car}, elevator = #{elevator}, air_conditioner = #{air_conditioner}, fridge = #{fridge}, washing_machine = #{washing_machine}, gas_stove = #{gas_stove}, electric_stove = #{electric_stove}, microwave = #{microwave}, desk = #{desk}, rack = #{rack}, bed = #{bed}, closet = #{closet}, shoecabinet = #{shoecabinet}, doorlock = #{doorlock}, wifi = #{wifi}, total = #{total} where property_no = #{property_no}
update property set property_hits = property_hits+1 where property_no = #{property_no}
update property set reply_count = reply_count+1 where property_no = #{property_no}
update property set reply_count = reply_count-1 where property_no = #{property_no}
mapper.select: select pro.property_no property_no, pro.rent_type rent_type, pro.deposit deposit, pro.month_fee month_fee, pro.property_title property_title, pic.pic_name pic_name, pic.pic_savename pic_savename from (select property_no, rent_type, deposit, month_fee, property_title from property where address||' '||address_detail like '%'||#{address}||'%') pro, (select property_no, pic_name, pic_savename from picture where pic_division = 'main') pic where pro.property_no = pic.property_no
select searchtext from position where searchtext like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
select position_address from position where searchtext = #{searchaddress}
